name: sportingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows fairness and respect towards others, especially an opposing team or player: The opposing fans sportingly joined in with the applause as the injured player left the pitch. His new neighbour sportingly offered to help out.
More examplesFewer examplesThe player sportingly returned the ball to the opposition's goalkeeper. He accepted the situation sportingly.Sportingly, he walked off without waiting for the umpire's decision.You try and take it sportingly, but it hurts a lot when you lose like this.
